title: Masterpiece if you can taste it. Not for everybody
review: I am a big horror movie fan. I watch every horror movie release in theaters, when I talk about this movie, I compare it to the shining, two awesome movies which are scary, but the first adjective I come along thinking about this movie is awesome movie, not scary . This will be a future classic. Since The shining I haven't seen anything similar.

title: masterpiece
review: Not just a superhero movie, just a piece of art. Must see!!

title: WTF IS THIS!!!!
review: How can someone rate this higher than 0. Incredible the world we are living in.

title: so dissapointed!!
review: It is an insult to the original film. I really love the 1st chapter because it sticks to the original story. This one is terrible. It is not a horror film, it is not a comedy I don't know what it is. Just wasted 3 hours of my life.I give 3 stars because I am a pennywise hardcore fan.

title: Best slasher film ever made
review: Awesome movie, a must see for any slasher/horror movie fan.
